# Welcome-Structure
public class Pattern2 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
 		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
        for(int i=1;i<=5;i++)
        {
        	for(int j=0;j<=1;j++)
        	{
        		System.out.print("* ");
        	}
        	for(int k=2;k<i;k++)
        	{
        		System.out.print("  * ");
        	}
        	System.out.println(" ");
        }
	}

}
